Located in the Klahanie Subdivision Issaquah, WA 98029 Come visit Klahanie Center Today! With great stores like QFC , Klahanie Chiropractic, Klahanie Vet, Klahanie Cleaners, Klahanie Dentistry, Klahanie Eye Care, Chans Place, Plateau Music, Albert's Jewelers, Klahanie Chevron, Brightmont Academy, Wellsfargo and many more!
